summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Bee It Feedback system. All 41 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend testing shows all core features working correctly: login for all 3 roles, role-based dashboards, navigation, CRUD operations, filters, notifications, feedback acknowledgment, action plan management, and collaborator profile.

ui_bugs.issue: No visible error message displayed for invalid login attempts
ui_bugs.details: Invalid login correctly prevents access and keeps user on login page, but no visible error toast/message shown to user

action_items: Add visible error message/toast for invalid login attempts
critical_code_review_comments: React useEffect dependency warnings in multiple pages (ActionPlanDetail, ActionPlans, CollaboratorProfile, FeedbackDetail) - not critical but should be addressed for code quality
seed_data_creation: Seed data endpoint /api/seed creates demo users, teams, feedbacks, action plans, and check-ins. Already seeded.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All APIs and UI features are working correctly. Backend tests are in /app/backend/tests/test_beeit_api.py. The system supports 3 user roles (ADMIN, GESTOR, COLABORADOR) with proper permission controls. Dark mode UI is implemented and working well. Only minor issue is missing error message for invalid login.

backend: User CRUD (list, create, get, update, delete)
Team CRUD (list, create, get, update, delete)
Feedback CRUD (list, create, get, update, delete)
Action Plan CRUD (list, create, get, update, delete)
Action Plan Items CRUD (create, list, update/toggle)
Notifications list and mark all read
frontend: Login page loads with Bee It logo
Admin login and dashboard with metrics (users, teams, feedbacks, plans)
Gestor login and dashboard with alerts (atrasados, 7 dias, 30 dias)
Colaborador login and dashboard with metrics
Users page with role badges and search
Feedback creation form with all fields
Action Plans page with progress bars
Action Plan detail with items and check-ins
Collaborator profile with timeline and recurring points

visual_verification.glassmorphism_cards: Working on dashboard and detail pages
